# Making Baking Pancakes

## Description

How many layers are on your pancakes?

Author: Dylan (elbee3779)

## Solution

* [solve.py](solve.py)

This challenge involves solving a series of base64 decoding challenges in a limited timeframe. Each challenge is a base64-encoded message which contains another encoded message and a number `n` indicating how many more times the message must be decoded. We send the final decoded message back to the server, which will send us the next challenge if our answer is correct. Repeat this 1000 times to get the flag!

Sample Output:
```
‚ùØ nc chal.pctf.competitivecyber.club 9001
Welcome to the pancake shop!
Pancakes have layers, we need you to get through them all to get our secret pancake mix formula.
This server will require you to complete 1000 challenge-responses.
A response can be created by doing the following:
1. Base64 decoding the challenge once (will output (encoded|n))
2. Decoding the challenge n more times.
3. Send (decoded|current challenge iteration)
Example response for challenge 485/1000: e9208047e544312e6eac685e4e1f7e20|485
Good luck!

Challenge: 
```

Flag: `pctf{store_bought_pancake_batter_fa82370}`
